org.grouplens.lenskit.eval

Class TrainModelTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<T>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.AbstractTask<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableFuture<T>, Future<T>, EvalTask<T>

    public class TrainModelTask<T>
extends AbstractTask<T>
    Train a recommender algorithmInfo and process it with a function.
